lines.text: Earlier cell phone: 163 pixels per square inch
Later cell phone: 326 pixels per square inch

secText:
Lesson:
1. Apply the concepts of interference and wavelength to [OBJ:pwsec_r988:color].
2. Apply the concept of resolving power to [OBJ:pwsec_r989:computer displays].
3. Apply the concept of color to [OBJ:pwsec_r990:pixels and subpixels].
